/*import React from 'react'; function HelpCenter() { return (

Help Center

Welcome to the Help Center! Here you can find answers to common questions and get support.

  • How do I book a session?

    • - Go to the Find Teacher page and browse available teachers.

    - Click on a tutor‚Äôs profile to view their availability.

    - Go to the Booking page

    - Select a date and time that works for you.

    - Click Book Session and confirm your booking.

    You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email once the session is scheduled.

  • How do I reset my password?

    • - Click on Login and then select Forgot Password..

    - Click on a tutor‚Äôs profile to view their availability.

    - Go to the Booking page

    - Select a date and time that works for you.

    - Click Book Session and confirm your booking.

    You‚Äôll receive a confirmation email once the session is scheduled.

  • How do I contact my tutor?
  • How do I update my profile?
  • How do I pay for a session?

Need more help?

Email us at support@myteacherapp.com

); } export default HelpCenter; /* #### üîê How do I reset my password? If you‚Äôve forgotten your password or want to change it: - Click on **Login** and then select **Forgot Password**. - - You‚Äôll receive a password reset link via email. - Follow the link to create a new password and log in again. #### üì¨ How do I contact my tutor? To reach your tutor: - Go to the **Messages** section in your dashboard. - Select your tutor from the list of contacts. - Type your message and click **Send**. - You‚Äôll be notified when your tutor replies. #### üë§ How do I update my profile? To update your personal information: - Navigate to **Tutor Profile** or **Student Profile** from the dashboard. - Click **Edit Profile**. - Update your name, bio, profile picture, or other details. - Click **Save Changes** to apply your updates. #### üí≥ How do I pay for a session? To make a payment: - After booking a session, go to the **Approved Sessions** section. - Click on the session you want to pay for. - Choose your preferred payment method (credit card, mobile money, etc.). - Follow the prompts to complete the transaction. - You‚Äôll receive a receipt via email once payment is successful. ---*/
